Job Description: Hiring for well funded product startup company based out in Mumbai.  Experience : 3+ yrs   Work Location : Mumbai  What we are looking :  - Looking for strong startup or product background.  - Willing to work independently and responsible for system architecture and development current and future product.  - Starting from the scratch, prototype and deliver innovative product solutions.  - Exposure on architectural principles and design patterns will be added advantage.  - Mentoring small team or juniors on their appropriate application.  Job Description :  - 3 to 5 years of experience doing hands-on software development including server side development especially Java platform  - Good experience of OOPS and Modern Design Patterns on Linux, Apache, MySQL, NOSQL .  - Writing high level code to scale the product.  - Web Services - Experience building modern web services  - You have experience in solving scalability problems on enterprise internet products.  - You are highly effective and thrive in a dynamic environment with multiple, changing priorities.  - You take great pride in innovating new products that are used by millions of users.  - You know what's important when releasing software to end users and have been through the process from start to finish.  - Data analysis and debugging skills  Preferred Qualifications : BE/BTech in Computer Engineering or related field or equivalent from a reputed institute
